pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python Windows SDKPython bindings for the Windows SDK.This is a community-supported version of the unmaintained [winrt] package.[winrt]: https://pypi.org/project/winrt## InstallationThis package is distributed on PyPI as the [winsdk] package. # use your favorite environment manager poetry add winsdk pipenv install winsdk pip install winsdk[winsdk]: https://pypi.org/project/winsdk## Documentationhttps://python-winsdk.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
